title: i got permanently banned??
body:
I got permanantly banned. I understand I wasn't being sportsmanlike but I was far from toxic. saying "stop being a dick" isn't toxic. dick = jerk. if i called him something like "bitch" then that would be toxic because that's degrading him. i literally just asked him to not be toxic. not only was he the only one who wanted to report me (the urgot i was vs), his whole team agreed with me that i wasn't being toxic, noone on my team was flaming me, and their whole team wanted to report urgot.
game 2 i wasn't even flaming vlad. he was yelling at me all game because when i asked for assistance at objectives when everyone else was doing it, he didn't do baron and we got nothing from it cuz we didnt get it. then i asked why and he gives me this giant speech and i say "stfu" that isnt toxic. that's just saying to shut up because you're flooding the chat. i also said "stfu" when he was flaming me. yes i wasn't helping in fights that much. but that was cuz i was useless. view the chat and i literally say "im useless in fights rn" which is why i splitpushed all game and why we won. i literally solo'd 7 turrets including the two nexus turrets, and top and bot inhibitor. so yes, i was not being sportsmanlike. but i wasn't being toxic, never called him a name besides a dick, which literally means being a jerk and being toxic. so this does not deserve a permanent ban.

GAME ONE CHAT: http://imgur.com/a/e2B17
GAME TWO CHAT: http://imgur.com/a/SoPUa
